actions.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 222 - 198 (Roll no. 7).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: A concurrent resolution providing for a recess or adjournment of the Senate from January 9, 1997 to January 21, 1997, and an adjournment of the House from January 9, 1997 to January 20, 1997, from January 20, 1997 to January 21, 1997, and from January 21, 1997 to February 4, 1997.

summary.text: Provides for a recess or adjournment of the Senate on January 9, 1997, until January 21, 1997, and an adjournment of the House of Representatives on: (1) January 9, 1997, until January 20, 1997; (2) January 20, 1997, until January 21, 1997; and (3) January 21, 1997, until February 4, 1997.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for a recess or adjournment of the Senate from January 9, 1997 to January 21, 1997, and an adjournment of the House from January 9, 1997 to January 20, 1997, from January 20, 1997 to January 21, 1997, and from January 21, 1997 to February 4, 1997.
